page.title: 12SOCIAL CONCERNS:INTERVIEW
page.content: {MRS. ROSE}IS{LIBRARIAN}AT{CHICKERELL {VILLAGE LIBRARY}.SHE HAS BEEN{ {LIBRARIAN}FOR{10 YEARS}.{MRS. ROSE} WOULDN'T LIKE TO BE A{LIBRARIAN}IN A BIG{CITY}BECAUSE SHE WOULD MISS THE PUBLIC. THE HARDEST PART OF HER JOB SHE SAYS IS TO KEEP A GOOD SELECTION OF BOOKS.{MRS. ROSE}LIKES HER JOB BECAUSE SHE LIKES MEETING PEOPLE AND LIKES TO HEAR HOW THEY ENJOY READING BOOKS. ONCE A LADY TOUCHED A BOOK ON DISPLAY ON THE SHELF AND ALL THE BOOKS FELL DOWN LIKE A ROW OF DOMINOES. EVERYONE IN THE{LIBRARY}JUST STOOD AND LAUGHED. SOMETIMES PEOPLE HAVE MEETINGS AT THE{LIBRARY}AND SOMETIMES PEOPLE JUST COME INTO THE{LIBRARY}TO HAVE SOMEONE TO TALK TO, LIKE THE OLD LADY WHO HAD JUST LOST HER DOG.
